name: DRAIN (ugurkupeli)
description:
DRAIN is a third person endless shooter game made for the Juice Game jam on January 2022.

Traverse a large arena as you kill hostile aliens! 

 Level up and choose upgrade perks!

 Enemies will get more numerous and harder as you level up!

Classic Drum & Bass mix by Lord Keksz, https://soundcloud.com/lordkeksz
